SELECT *, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(M.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_CD,3),M.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_CD) AS CODE_NAME FROM PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P
INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID
INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO
INNER JOIN MATERIAL_PRODUCT M ON P.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO = M.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO
INNER JOIN FACTORY_STORAGE F ON P.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = F.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO
ORDER BY PURCHASE_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{lastRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT (PURCHASE_NO , PURCHASE_DATE , CLIENT_NO , EMPLOYEE_ID , MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO , TOTAL_PRICE , FACTORY_STORAGE_NO , PURCHASE_IN_DATE , MOD_MENU , REG_ID , REG_DATE , REG_MENU , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE) VALUES (#{purchaseNo} , NOW() , #{clientNo} , #{employeeId} , #{materialProductNo} , #{totalPrice} , #{factoryStorageNo} , #{purchaseInDate} , #{modMenu} , #{regId} , NOW() , #{regMenu} , #{modId} , NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLIENT_LIST WHERE CLIENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT * FROM FACTORY_STORAGE WHERE FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = (SELECT CODE FROM CODE WHERE CODE_NAME = #{codeName})
SELECT F.*, C.* FROM FACTORY_STORAGE F LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE C ON F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD = C.CODE
SELECT M.*, C.* FROM MATERIAL_PRODUCT M LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE C ON M.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_CD = C.CODE

SELECT *, FN_CODE_NAME(LEFT(F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD,3),F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD) AS CODE_NAME FROM PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P
INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID
INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO
INNER JOIN MATERIAL_PRODUCT M ON P.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO = M.MATERIAL_PRODUCT_NO
INNER JOIN FACTORY_STORAGE F ON P.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = F.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO
WHERE P.PURCHASE_NO=#{purchaseNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASE_MANAGEMENT P , FN_CODE_NAME(LEFT(F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD,3),F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD) AS FACTORY_NAME INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE H ON P.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID INNER JOIN CLIENT_LIST C ON P.CLIENT_NO = C.CLIENT_NO INNER JOIN FACTORY_STORAGE F ON P.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO = F.FACTORY_STORAGE_NO SET C.CLIENT_NAME=#{salesClientVO.clientName} , H.NAME=#{humanResourceVO.name} , F.FACTORY_STORAGE_CD=#{factoryStorageCd}, P .PURCHASE_IN_DATE=#{purchaseInDate} , P.MOD_DATE=NOW() WHERE P.PURCHASE_NO=#{purchaseNo}
